item.title: By: Deimos Arcana Update - New Necramech - MarvWeb
item.dc:creator: Deimos Arcana Update - New Necramech - MarvWeb
item.description: […] Its blueprints can be acquired from the Necraloid Syndicate, with the main blueprint obtainable at max rank (Rank 3: Odima) for 10,000 standing and the four component blueprints requiring 3,500 standing each. The component blueprints will require damaged parts obtained from isolation vaults. […]
item.content:encoded: […] Its blueprints can be acquired from the Necraloid Syndicate, with the main blueprint obtainable at max rank (Rank 3: Odima) for 10,000 standing and the four component blueprints requiring 3,500 standing each. The component blueprints will require damaged parts obtained from isolation vaults. […]
